text: Hey <@U0261PCRQ>, don't know if you already get notified about comments on your post but I wanted to let you know there's a new one in case you don't receive said notifications. <http://uncorkedstudios.com/blog/background-location-updates-on-android#comment-1426878533>

attachments.title: Uncorked Studios Blog Background Location Updates on Android
attachments.text: Recently, I’ve been working on some updates to the Android version of one of Uncorked’s originals, FlareMail. There have been several changes to Android APIs since it was written and it was time to make some updates and improvements.
attachments.fallback: Uncorked Studios: Uncorked Studios Blog Background Location Updates on Android

text: <@U02618EV1> is it possible to set up Disqus so that we get emailed when our posts get comments?
Yes, you can subscribe to specific post comment feeds.
